analysis.description:
CryptoWuxiaVoting.withdrawAll (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#146-151) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#148-151)

CryptoWuxiaVoting.withdrawAmount (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#151-152) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#152)
CryptoWuxiaVoting.isContract (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#382-386) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#49-71) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#52-53)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#53-54)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#54-57)

CryptoWuxiaVoting (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#73-395) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#311-325)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#330-333)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#333-341)

CryptoWuxiaVoting.name.name (local variable @ /unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#265) shadows:
	- CryptoWuxiaVoting.name (function @ /unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#262-265)

CryptoWuxiaVoting.symbol.symbol (local variable @ /unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#268) shadows:
	- CryptoWuxiaVoting.symbol (function @ /unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#265-268)

CryptoWuxiaVoting.populateFromItemRegistry has external calls inside a loop:
	- priceOfItem[_itemIds[i]] > 0 || itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemIds[i]) == 0 (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#158-161)

Reentrancy in CryptoWuxiaVoting.listItemFromRegistry (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#162-172):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(itemRegistry.ownerOf(_itemId) != address(0)) (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#166-167)
	- require(bool)(itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemId) > 0) (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#167-170)
	- price = itemRegistry.priceOf(_itemId) (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#170)
	- itemOwner = itemRegistry.ownerOf(_itemId) (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#170-171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- listedItems (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#171-172)
	- ownerOfItem (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#171-172)
	- priceOfItem (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#171-172)

CryptoWuxiaVoting.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#382-386)
	- /unique_chucks/12/0x06426743ab506a2d542e2ef08a680d948917dbe6.sol#383-385
